headline: Intel AI Push Deepens With SambaNova Bet And New GPU Chief
summary: Intel (NasdaqGS:INTC) is committing at least US$100 million to AI chip startup SambaNova Systems. The company has also appointed former Qualcomm executive Eric Demers as its new Chief GPU Architect. Both moves reflect a shift in how Intel is approaching AI chips and GPU development. Intel, known for its x86 processors and data center products, is increasingly tied to demand for AI computing across cloud, enterprise, and edge use cases. The SambaNova investment adds capital to a specialist...
